ComicInfo.Summary:
Plague is spreading, wiping out an entire city while its dying ruler has taken what no human should possess: Hellspawn Necroplasm. What abomination will erupt when the Necroplasm intermingles with the flesh of a dead holy man? Far away, an old "friend" has returned to Covenant and told him of the catastrophe. Now Covenant, together with Gareth the Druid, must travel to the City of Plague and confront the ungodly horror that awaits them.
Note: This issue is published by Top Cow
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-02 18:13:30. [CVDB111765]
ComicInfo.Inker: David Finch, Joe Weems, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: David Finch, Steve Firchow, Victor Llamas
